description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Scripting Engine security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-43584):

1. Download and install the relevant update package corresponding to your Windows build from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes are fully integrated.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a security feature bypass vulnerability that could be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access or permissions. It is classified under CWE-693: Protection Mechanism Failure.
- Ensure your system is running an affected version of Windows 11 before proceeding with these updates.
- Backup critical data before applying the updates to prevent any adverse outcome during installation.
